{
    "recipe_name": "Vietnamese Banana Bread",
    "dateTime_utc": "2021-09-27T17:00:00Z",
    "preparation_time": 10,
    "cooking_time": 60,
    "total_cooking_time": 70,
    "servings": 8,
    "ingredients": [
        {
            "name": "farine de blé entier",
            "quantity": "225",
            "unit_of_measure": "tasse"
        },
        {
            "name": "poudre à pâte",
            "quantity": "5",
            "unit_of_measure": "ml"
        },
        {
            "name": "cannelle moulue",
            "quantity": "5",
            "unit_of_measure": "ml"
        },
        {
            "name": "sel",
            "quantity": "1",
            "unit_of_measure": "ml"
        },
        {
            "name": "piment de la Jamaïque moulu",
            "quantity": "2.5",
            "unit_of_measure": "ml"
        },
        {
            "name": "bananes",
            "quantity": "3",
            "unit_of_measure": ""
        },
        {
            "name": "cassonade",
            "quantity": "105",
            "unit_of_measure": "g"
        }
    ],
    "prepSteps": [
        "Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).",
        "Grease a 9-inch (23-cm) loaf pan with butter or cooking spray.",
        "In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and allspice.",
        "In a separate mixing bowl, mash the bananas with a fork.",
        "Add the mashed bananas and brown sugar to the dry ingredients.",
        "Mix until everything is well combined.",
        "Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.",
        "Bake for 55 - 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the banana bread comes out clean.",
        "Remove from the oven and let it cool for 10 minutes.",
        "Remove the bread from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack."
    ],
    "notes": "",
    "remaining_Ingredients": [],
    "category": "Dessert",
    "keywords": ["Vietnamese", "banana bread", "baked", "dessert"]
}

{
    "recipe_name": "Banana Bread",
    "dateTime_utc": "2021-10-06T17:30:00Z",
    "preparation_time": 15,
    "cooking_time": 60,
    "total_cooking_time": 75,
    "servings": 8,
    "ingredients": [
        {"name": "whole wheat flour", "quantity": "1 1/2", "unit_of_measure": "cups"},
        {"name": "baking powder", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ground cinnamon", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "salt", "quantity": "1/4", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ground allspice", "quantity": "1/2", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ripe bananas, mashed", "quantity": "3", "unit_of_measure": null},
        {"name": "brown sugar", "quantity": "1/2", "unit_of_measure": "cup"}
    ],
    "prepSteps": [
        "Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).",
        "Grease a 9x5-inch (23x13 cm) loaf pan with butter or cooking spray.",
        "In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and allspice.",
        "In a separate bowl, mix together the mashed bananas and brown sugar.",
        "Fold the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined.",
        "Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan.",
        "Bake for 55-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the bread comes out clean.",
        "Cool the banana bread in the pan for 10 minutes before removing it to a wire rack to cool completely."
    ],
    "notes": "This banana bread is a delicious and healthy snack or breakfast option that can be enjoyed by anyone.",
    "remaining_Ingredients": [
        {"name": "whole wheat flour", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "cups"},
        {"name": "baking powder", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ground cinnamon", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "salt", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ground allspice", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "tsp"},
        {"name": "ripe bananas, mashed", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": null},
        {"name": "brown sugar", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "cup"}
    ],
    "category": "Dessert",
    "keywords": ["Banana Bread", "Italian cuisine", "healthy"]
}

{
    "recipe_name": "Vietnamese Beef Pho",
    "dateTime_utc": "2021-09-06T15:00:00Z",
    "preparation_time": 30,
    "cooking_time": 180,
    "total_cooking_time": 210,
    "servings": 4,
    "ingredients": [
        { "name": "filet de boeuf", "quantity": "500", "unit_of_measure": "g" },
        { "name": "vermicelle de riz", "quantity": "400", "unit_of_measure": "g" },
        { "name": "citronelle", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "tige" },
        { "name": "germes de soja", "quantity": "400", "unit_of_measure": "g" },
        { "name": "feuilles de salade", "quantity": "20", "unit_of_measure": "" },
        { "name": "concombre", "quantity": "3", "unit_of_measure": "" },
        { "name": "oignons", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "" },
        { "name": "Oeufs", "quantity": "6", "unit_of_measure": "unités" },
        { "name": "Farine", "quantity": "500", "unit_of_measure": "grammes" },
        { "name": "Sucre", "quantity": "250", "unit_of_measure": "grammes" },
        { "name": "Sel", "quantity": "5", "unit_of_measure": "grammes" },
        { "name": "Beurre", "quantity": "200", "unit_of_measure": "grammes" },
        { "name": "Lait", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "litre" },
        { "name": "Levure chimique", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "cuillères à café" },
        { "name": "Poivre noir", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "pincée" },
        { "name": "Huile olive", "quantity": "50", "unit_of_measure": "millilitres" },
        { "name": "Citron", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "unité" },
        { "name": "ginger", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "pouces" },
        { "name": "nước lèo", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "L" }
    ],
    "prepSteps": [
        "Add the beef bones and ginger slices to a large pot of boiling water and blanch for 5-10 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water.",
        "In another large pot of boiling water, blanch the beef for about 5 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water.",
        "In a cheesecloth bundle, combine coriander seeds, star anise, cinnamon stick and cloves. Tie up with a string.",
        "Toast the spices in a dry pan over medium heat until fragrant.",
        "In a pot, combine the toasted spices, the onion and the ginger and cook for 5 minutes.",
        "Add the beef bones and the broth to the pot, bring to a boil and reduce to a simmer. Skim off any scum that appears on the surface.",
        "Simmer for 2-3 hours, then strain the broth through a fine-mesh strainer.",
        "Slice the beef as thinly as possible.",
        "Prepare the noodles according to package instructions, then drain and rinse with cold water.",
        "In a large bowl, place bean sprouts, basil leaves, mint leaves and lime wedges.",
        "Ladle the hot broth over the noodles and beef slices in a serving bowl, then add the bean sprouts, basil, mint, lime juice and jalapeno slices on top.",
        "Serve with hoisin sauce, sriracha sauce and hot peppers as desired."
    ],
    "notes": "",
    "category": "Main Course",
    "keywords": ["Vietnamese cuisine", "noodle soup", "beef", "healthy"]
}

{
    "recipe_name": "Beef Noodle Salad",
    "dateTime_utc": "2023-06-01T14:00:00Z",
    "preparation_time": 45,
    "cooking_time": 15,
    "total_cooking_time": 60,
    "servings": 4,
    "ingredients": [
        {"name": "filet de boeuf", "quantity": "500", "unit_of_measure": "g"},
        {"name": "vermicelle de riz", "quantity": "200", "unit_of_measure": "g"},
        {"name": "citronelle", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "tige"},
        {"name": "germes de soja", "quantity": "400", "unit_of_measure": "g"},
        {"name": "feuilles de salade", "quantity": "20", "unit_of_measure": ""},
        {"name": "concombre", "quantity": "3", "unit_of_measure": ""},
        {"name": "oignons", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": ""},
        {"name": "Oeufs", "quantity": "6", "unit_of_measure": "unités"},
        {"name": "Farine", "quantity": "500", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Sucre", "quantity": "250", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Sel", "quantity": "5", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Beurre", "quantity": "200", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Lait", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "litre"},
        {"name": "Levure chimique", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "cuillères à café"},
        {"name": "Poivre noir", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "pincée"},
        {"name": "Huile olive", "quantity": "50", "unit_of_measure": "millilitres"},
        {"name": "Citron", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "unité"}
    ],
    "prepSteps": [
        "Cook the vermicelli noodles according to package instructions, then rinse under cold water and set aside.",
        "Grill the beef to desired doneness, then slice into thin strips.",
        "Cut the cucumber and onion into thin slices.",
        "Combine the noodles, beef, cucumber, onion, and bean sprouts in a large bowl, toss well.",
        "To make the dressing, whisk together olive oil, fish sauce, lime juice, brown sugar, and pepper.",
        "Drizzle the dressing over the salad, then toss to combine.",
        "Garnish with chopped peanuts and chopped fresh cilantro."
    ],
    "notes": "This salad is best served cold and can be made ahead of time.",
    "remaining_Ingredients": [
        {"name": "filet de boeuf", "quantity": "0", "unit_of_measure": "g"},
        {"name": "vermicelle de riz", "quantity": "200", "unit_of_measure": "g"},

        {"name": "Farine", "quantity": "500", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Sucre", "quantity": "250", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Sel", "quantity": "5", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Beurre", "quantity": "200", "unit_of_measure": "grammes"},
        {"name": "Lait", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "litre"},
        {"name": "Levure chimique", "quantity": "2", "unit_of_measure": "cuillères à café"},
        {"name": "Poivre noir", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "pincée"},
        {"name": "Huile olive", "quantity": "50", "unit_of_measure": "millilitres"},
        {"name": "Citron", "quantity": "1", "unit_of_measure": "unité"}

    "category": "Salad",
